ja386:1.2: vastaṁ → bhastaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kalakaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); garaṁ (mr)
ja386:2.1: Tvaṁ khopi → tvaṁ nu kho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); tvaṁ ca kho (pts-vp-pli1)
ja386:3.1: Aparampi samma te bālyaṁ → ayampi samma te bālo (mr)
ja386:5.2: bhariyāya yo padassati → bhariyā yo padassati (pts-vp-pli1); bhariyā na bhavissati (mr)
ja386:6.1: Na ve piyammeti → na piyammeti (sya1ed, sya2ed); na piyameti (mr); na piyamedanti (katthaci)
